Line: So.
This is it, huh?
It seems like it.
I'm sorry, for everything...
Please, don't be.
About the whole thing with the children and the priest...
I... understand their decision now.
If they did come forward... with the news about... the humans...
I can't say that we wouldn't have done anything about it. But -
I understand. I see now how blinded I was by my devotion, and...
I understand why they acted the way they did.
I hope you don't blame yourself...
Of course I do.
But I choose now to forgive myself. And the human priest.
I still detest the invaders who killed us. But...
There's no point in me staying here. All that's left to protect is old sticks and stones.
The temple... It was never about the goddess.
Well, it was, but... It was mostly about the community.
And now that I know survivors are out there... Even if it's only a few...
I'm sure they wouldn't want me to stay here any longer.
Priestess...
Please. Call me by my name.
Ah, I never did get around telling you that, did I?
Haha, I didn't tell you mine either, so no worries.
And... it appears your ride is here.
It appears so.
Thank you, human.
And I hope you also...
Yes?
Nevermind. I hope you do get to go back to life.
I will! And I'll try to find your people, and I'll tell them everything I learnt here!
...Yes.
Goodbye now.
See you around!
